resources.string: Bill Zippersly\n\nRide along with your not-so-friendly neighbourhood conspiracy theorist and he\'ll tell you about the people around you.
Tina & Trisha\n\nEavesdrop on these gossipy girls as they talk about what\'s hot and what\'s totally not.
Abraham Swanson\n\nThis unflappably friendly guy has a story to tell and you get to choose the ending.
